name: Jane’s Hotel 3: Hotel Mania
description:
Our business lady Jane comes back again! In this challenging sequel to such well-known hits as Jane's Hotel and Jane's Hotel: Family Hero you are to help Jane's niece Jenny polish her hotel management skills. Travel all over the world together with Jenny, visit Scotland, Egypt, Monaco and Russia to become a real hotel magnate! 40 challenging time management levels and 8 exciting mini games are sure to make your journey unforgettable! Try to complete the levels with the highest score to build your own grand mansion!
Jane's Hotel Mania has a lot in store for you: interesting story line, lots of new guests, cool mini games, numerous upgrades and much more! Play Jane's Hotel Mania now, explore the latest trends in hotel business together with Jane and Jenny, become a real hotel king!

- 4 episodes in Scotland, Egypt, Monaco and Russia
- 40 time management levels
- 8 challenging mini-games
- new guests and upgrades
- fascinating graphics

Follow us on: http://www.facebook.com/RealoreGame
